title: Interpretation of a dream about bloodshed by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about drawing blood: It can indicate many signs of present and future life, according to what the dreamer says. A person may see that someone is drawing blood from his hand or trying to draw blood from his head, and the dreamer may dream that the blood is intended for analysis purposes or that it will be donated to another person. Interpretation of a dream about drawing blood A dream about drawing blood from the dreamer may tell him that someone may benefit from it in the period Coming, and this benefit is often material. The dream of drawing blood from the dreamer may indicate stability in life in the next stage, and therefore whoever sees this dream must do everything in his power to reach this stability. The dream of drawing spoiled blood can warn the dreamer Of forbidden money, and therefore he must carefully search for his source of livelihood and pray to God Almighty often to avoid suspicious ways and help him be righteous. A dream about receiving malicious blood from the dreamer may foretell that he will be relieved of stress and anxiety, and therefore the dreamer should be more optimistic and pray God Almighty brings goodness, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about bloodshed by Ibn Sirin: A dream about drawing blood for the scholar Ibn Sirin could be good news for most good people. Because of his financial problems and his enjoyment of luxury and comfort, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about drawing blood for a single woman: The interpretation of a dream about drawing blood for a single girl depends mainly on the form of blood that leaves her body. Not pure, this may indicate that the dreamer is suffering from problems and pain in life, but soon he may find relief from God Almighty and thus not despair. As for the dream of drawing blood and it does not come out of his hand, it may symbolize the presence of a harmful person in the dreamer’s life, causing If he falls into problems and misfortunes, he must pay attention to this person and pray. . To God often to avoid evil. Interpretation of a dream about a blood collection syringe for unmarried women: Seeing someone drawing blood with a syringe in a dream can be interpreted as good news about the dreamer’s upcoming marriage, and one should not be optimistic about the good and pray to God often for a good husband. And a stable life, or the dream may symbolize the abundance of food that awaits the dreamer soon, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about drawing blood for a married woman: Drawing blood in a dream for a married woman may herald her imminent release from physical pain and illness, by following medical instructions and a lot of supplication to God Almighty and asking Healing from Him, Glory be to Him. He prays to God for wellness. A woman may dream that someone is taking a sample of her blood for analysis purposes. Here, the dream of drawing blood indicates the possibility of some marital problems occurring between the dreamer and her life partner, and she must do everything in her power to get rid of them. Instead of developing it in a very annoying way, and God Almighty knows. Interpretation of a dream about taking blood for a pregnant woman: A dream about drawing blood for a pregnant woman may indicate that she is in good health, and therefore she must stop worrying and panicking about her health and focus on caring for her child and praying to God Almighty a lot until the moment of her birth. You may suffer from it, so you must be strong, patient, and ask for God's help

title: The 5 most famous interpretations of seeing a bridge in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing a broken bridge? Evidence of malice and malice from an enemy. Meaning of seeing a small, dilapidated bridge? Evidence of failure to achieve goals. What is the interpretation of seeing someone breaking a bridge in a dream? It indicates a failed engagement. Meaning of seeing a high bridge? Proof of marriage to A man with money. What is the interpretation of seeing a bridge collapsing in a dream? It indicates marital differences. Interpretation of seeing a bridge in a dream. Seeing a bridge in a dream indicates some positive changes in the dreamer’s life. Seeing a broken bridge is evidence of malice and spite from one of the enemies. Crossing a high bridge indicates changes Positive in the life of the dreamer. A broken bridge in a dream is an indication of finding a job and creating a livelihood. If a divorced woman sees the high bridge in a dream, this means that she will not return to her husband. Seeing a bridge collapsing in a dream is evidence of severing kinship. It is often a fall A bridge in a dream is an indication of the death of a family member. A small, dilapidated bridge is evidence of failure to achieve goals. If a person sees that he cannot cross the bridge, this indicates failure that will befall the dreamer. Seeing single people crossing the bridge. Crossing the bridge for single people is evidence of marriage. If a girl dreams That she is standing on top of a bridge, this indicates the fears that she is going through. If an unmarried woman sees that the bridge is being cut off in a dream, this indicates the failure of the engagement. Then seeing the high bridge is evidence of marrying a man with money. Seeing the bridge falling in a dream indicates failure. A love relationship. Interpretation of seeing a bridge collapsing for a married woman. If a married woman sees in a dream that she is crossing a bridge, this indicates sustenance and money. Crossing a bridge in a married woman’s dream indicates the good condition of her household, whether it is her husband or her children. If a married woman sees that the bridge is collapsing In a dream, this is a sign of divorce. A long bridge in a married woman’s dream indicates stability in marital life. The collapse of a bridge in a dream indicates marital strife. If a married woman sees that she is crossing the bridge and is able to cross, she will obtain a lot of livelihood and money. The bridge fell in A dream for a pregnant woman: Crossing the bridge in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of the presence of a male child. Then seeing the bridge in a pregnant woman’s dream is a sign of good condition and you do not feel the pain of childbirth. If a married woman sees herself falling from the bridge, this indicates that she will face some problems. Then Seeing a pregnant woman falling from a bridge is evidence of her fear of losing the fetus.

title: What does lipstick symbolize in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing lipstick in a dreamLipstick in a dream is one of the dreams in which interpreters disagree. In fact, adornment for a woman is only permitted for her husband and is not available at all for a foreign man, and lipstick has multiple colors, so we will learn about the interpretation of this vision and its meaning for a man. The dream and the woman, whether married or single. Interpretation of a dream about lipstick in a dream. Seeing lipstick in a dream may represent beautification and may indicate that the dreamer is one of the people who deceives those around him. It may have other signs depending on the various details of the vision and the condition of the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream Wearing lipstick for an unmarried woman according to Ibn Sirin. For an unmarried woman, lipstick in a dream can indicate a change in her life in the coming period, and for a girl of marriageable age, it can indicate a suitable husband, if the woman is not accustomed to wearing it in reality. A girl who is still a student, may indicate her academic excellence. And obtaining high grades. Ibn Sirin explained in the interpretation of the vision for an unmarried woman that if she sees her clothes or hands contaminated with it, this is a bad omen for her and she may be exposed to intrigues and problems in her life, and it may be so. She is deceived by the one who promised her marriage and did not fulfill his promise. Interpretation of a dream about wearing lipstick for a single woman. There are many opinions that have been taken about seeing an unmarried woman wearing lipstick in a dream. What was said in the best vision is that it is a change in the woman’s life and her moving to a new home, which is an indication of marriage Which will come soon. It can express the overcoming of difficulties and problems that a woman has faced in her life. If she dreams that someone is dressing her, then he is the one who will propose marriage to her soon. What was said about the evil of sight? If she slowly puts lipstick on her lips, this indicates That the woman faces a problem that weighs on her. If her appearance is beautiful after putting it on her lips, this is explained by her enjoyment of the wisdom of a single woman and her ability to make the right decisions at the right time. If she does not choose lipstick in a dream, this indicates the weakness of her character and her inability to make important decisions in the future. Her life. Some interpreters interpreted this vision as an indication that the dreamer is hypocritical, as he does not show what is inside him, but rather tries to beautify himself in order to get what he wants. Interpretation of buying lipstick in a dream for a single woman. If a girl buys it in her dream, this is evidence of her feeling of joy and happiness and her imminent marriage. But if he buys the most expensive things, this indicates that he lives in luxury and at a high social level. Seeing lipstick for a married woman. Lipstick in a married woman’s dream has many indicators that vary depending on her psychological state, if in reality she is facing some marital problems and a state of lack. Stability, seeing this shows her desire to end these problems by drawing her husband’s attention to her. But if her married life is stable, this indicates her love for her husband and her interest in her femininity and beauty, but if the husband is the one who wears red

title: Interpretation of seeing a motorcycle in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a motorcycle in a dream through seeing the website roy2a.com. The motorcycle is a means of transportation that many people use to carry one or two jobs from one place to another. Today, through this article, we will present to you the interpretation of seeing a motorcycle in a dream according to great translators such as Ibn Sirin and Ibn Sirin. Many and other dream interpretation scholars, follow us according to the status of the fortuneteller, whether he is male, single, or married. Interpretation of seeing a motorcycle in a dream. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a motorcycle in a dream indicates the dreamer’s relationship with those around him. Seeing the ability to ride a motorcycle in a dream indicates that the dreamer He will receive reward for his pursuit in life, and he will achieve great success soon, and God knows best. The difficulty of riding a motorcycle in a dream indicates many obstacles and crises in the dreamer’s life during this period. Riding a motorcycle at high speed in a dream indicates that the viewer is a reckless person who makes all his important decisions without thinking carefully. What might happen. Seeing a motorcycle accident in a dream shows that the dreamer has failed at something in his life. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing an ambulance in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a motorcycle in a dream for a single woman. Seeing individual motorcycles in a dream announces that she will achieve great success and excel in her academic life. And the process. Riding a motorcycle in a dream for a single woman shows that she is a strong and wise girl who has the ability to make all the important decisions related to her life. Riding a motorcycle on a good road in a lonely dream shows that she is a good and religious girl. Buying a motorcycle in a dream for a single woman shows that he will get married soon. See interpretations Other: Interpretation of seeing a new car in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a motorcycle in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman with a red motorcycle in a dream indicates that he is living a married life full of love, happiness, and satisfaction. Riding a motorcycle at a good speed in a dream for a married woman. It indicates that she is a woman with feeling and has the ability to Treating people well and in a good way. A motorcycle in the house in a dream for a married woman shows that happy things will happen in her life. Interpretation of seeing a motorcycle in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant motorcycle in a dream announces that she will give birth to a baby girl, and God knows best. A fast motorcycle in a dream for a pregnant woman shows that she will submit For an easy delivery process and you will not feel any fatigue. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing meat in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a motorcycle in a dream for a man. Seeing a man driving a motorcycle in a dream indicates that he will achieve great profits and gains in the coming period. A motorcycle making a loud noise in a dream for a man shows that he is a nervous person. He always loses control when dealing with people. Seeing a man with a new motorcycle in a dream shows that there will be a mutually beneficial relationship between him and someone close to him. Buying a motorcycle in a dream for someone shows that he will soon marry a suitable girl. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing buying gold in Dream Interpretation of Seeing Dar

title: Interpretation of a gun in a dream: Seeing a gun in a dream

preview.html: The concept of a machine gun for an unmarried girl, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a young boy and someone married to Ibn Sirin, shooting, a gunshot wound and other weapons. Interpretation of a weapon in a dream: In general, seeing a gun indicates security, tranquility, and a symbol of a strong and loyal woman. If this vision appears in a man’s dream, This means that he is a loyal, friendly and loving wife. Hearing the sound of gunshots indicates the dreamer’s fear. Placing the weapon on the shoulder or raising it on the wall is evidence of the high status of the dreamer. The gun can portend profit, goodness and gain. Pointing the gun at a familiar person, then the dream indicates that there is a dispute with him. As for pointing the gun at the thief It indicates getting rid of troubles and troubles. Shooting after seeing a gun in a dream is evidence of an opponent’s hostility. The gun in a single woman’s dream is good and safe. If an unmarried woman in a dream points her gun at something and hits it, this means that she will fulfill her dream, get a job, or go on an enjoyable tourist trip. The gun in a married woman’s dream symbolizes her stability and comfort, and in this vision it is a reference to a loyal friend. The gun in a pregnant woman’s dream is comfort and an indication of the approaching date of delivery. Whoever sees that he is carrying a weapon is interpreted by the government, and this dream means misfortune. Hearing the sound of a gun means loss of business and mismanagement of business property. If you shoot someone with a gun, you will feel disgraced. If someone shoots you, evil people will disturb you and you may be very sick. If a woman dreams that she is shooting, this dream portends to her a quarrel and an unpleasant reputation associated with feelings. Sensual. As for a married woman, it portends misfortune caused by others. If the dreamer sees that someone shot him and did not succeed in hitting him, or that he was injured but a simple hit did not cause a wound, this means that there are enemies who want to harm him, but he could not. To do this, dreaming about it is a warning about the presence of attention from those close to you in your life, but if a bullet hits you and you feel ashamed, this indicates that bad words about you will be said and spread among people, and there will be major problems because of it. The dream also indicates the presence of a charming person (creating strife and gossip). Whoever saw Blood is bleeding from his hand due to a fire, this means that there is a lawful livelihood and money nearby. And whoever sees that his legs are bleeding for the same reason, this means that there is a journey from which the dreamer will return with good and legitimate benefits, God willing. If you see someone attacking you with a gun and shooting you and seriously wounding you, this means That you should beware of this person because he will defeat you in your life. But if the person cannot convey to you, this means that you will harm him, and it is said that there is someone who speaks ill of you and you will succeed in silencing him. And whoever sees a lot of blood coming out of his body, this means that he is a waster. And thus poverty befalls him. A woman who sees a bullet wound, this indicates the money she will obtain from the inheritance. title: Interpretation of seeing the saying “God is great” in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing God saying Great in a dream Meanings of dreaming with God saying Great What is the interpretation of seeing a single, married and pregnant woman saying God is Great in a dream to see a man saying God is Great in a dream and its consequences? Saying God is Great is the first expression in the form of the call to prayer and prayer and the interpretation of seeing God saying God is Great. Larger, we explain it in detail below through our article today on our website. Vision website.Interpretation of seeing God’s great saying according to Ibn Sirin: Seeing God’s great saying in a dream always shows the dreamer thankful to God Almighty for all His blessings. Seeing God’s saying is a wonderful thing in a dream. Mention the many benefits that the viewer reaps in his life. Seeing God’s saying is a wonderful thing. In a dream, it indicates guidance, justice, and piety. Seeing the word of God is a great matter. In a dream, it shows a lot of wealth and kindness. Interpretation of seeing the word of God is great in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi: Seeing the word of God is a wonderful thing in a dream, and it indicates repentance and abandoning transgressions and transgressions. Seeing the word of God is a matter Wonderful in a dream, and it indicates that the dreamer will change his condition from bad to better, thanks to God Almighty. Seeing God’s saying is a wonderful thing in a dream. It indicates righteousness and piety. Interpretation of seeing God’s saying is excellent in a single woman’s dream: Seeing God’s saying is a wonderful thing in a dream for a single woman, declaring his goodness, purity, and chastity. Seeing a single woman saying God is a wonderful thing in a dream for a single woman. Whoever is not married shows good morals and good qualities. Seeing a single woman saying God is a wonderful thing in a dream. It announces her marriage to a man of justice, piety and good morals. Seeing a single woman saying God is a wonderful thing in a dream. It announces great confusion and broad livelihood. Your scope. Seeing a single woman saying God is a wonderful thing in a dream, and it indicates the end of worries and anxieties and the end of judgments. Interpretation of seeing God saying God is excellent in a married woman’s dream: Seeing God saying God is a wonderful thing in a married woman’s dream expresses the contentment and happiness that she enjoys in her life. Seeing God’s saying is a wonderful thing in a married woman’s dream announces the stability of her life with her husband. Seeing God’s saying is a wonderful thing in a married woman’s dream indicates achieving one’s goals and aspirations. Seeing God’s saying is a wonderful thing in a married woman’s dream announces that her provision is abundant and good. The interpretation of seeing God’s saying is wonderful For a pregnant woman in a dream: Seeing God’s saying is a wonderful thing in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the date of her upcoming birth. Seeing God’s saying is a wonderful thing in a pregnant woman’s dream. It indicates the ease of her birth. Seeing God’s saying is a wonderful thing in a pregnant woman’s dream shows that she has given birth to a child. Seeing God saying something wonderful in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the end of problems and adversities. Interpretation of seeing God saying God is great in a dream for a man: Seeing a man saying God is great in a dream indicates victory over enemies and eliminating them. Seeing God saying something wonderful in a dream for a man indicates positive changes. In the life of the dreamer. To see the saying of God is a wonderful thing in a dream for a man. It indicates the dreamer’s progress in his work and assuming high positions. To see the saying of God is a wonderful thing in a dream for a man. It indicates the disintegration of the dreamer.

title: Interpretation of a divorced woman’s dream of sleeping in bed

preview.html: But there are many different interpretations of this vision, which we will learn about in the following lines of your gptafser.com/ website, so follow us.Interpretation of seeing sleeping in bed in a dream for a single girlTo see sleeping in bed and resting in it in a dream for an unmarried girl.A metaphor for a feeling of peace and tranquility In her life in general. As for the unmarried girl who sees herself sleeping on an uncomfortable bed in a dream, this dream shows her fatigue and her struggle in life to achieve herself. As for the unmarried girl who dreams that she is sleeping with someone she knows, it is an indication that she does not trust this The person is dishonest and does not deserve her love for him. But if a single girl sees herself sleeping happily with someone she knows in bed in the dream. This dream symbolizes the dreamer’s love for this person and that he wishes to be her husband. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is sleeping next to A person in bed. A sign that he loves, respects, and appreciates this person. Seeing herself sleeping on a luxurious, white-furnished bed in a dream for a single girl. Good news that she is close to marrying a rich, qualified man. And when an unmarried girl dreams that she is sleeping next to one of her mahrams in a dream. This It indicates her love for this person in reality and that he is a role model for her, and she always succeeds in absorbing and containing her anger. See also: Interpretation of sleep in a dreamInterpretation of seeing sleeping in bed in a dream for a married womanWhen a married woman dreams that she is sleeping in bed next to her husband in a dream. A good sign. On the family bond and strong love between them. But if a married woman dreams that she is sleeping in bed with a stranger in the dream. That is, she is not happy with her husband and is thinking about others and wishes for a divorce, and God knows best. A married woman saw that his wife was sleeping next to her in bed in a dream and felt alienated from her. It is a sign of tension in the marital relationship for them, and a lack of interest or self-control from the husband to the viewer, and God knows best. Seeing an old and dilapidated woman sleeping in bed in a dream for a married woman. It is a symbol of a difficult life and an uncomfortable life due to many problems and disagreements, and God knows best. And in the event that A married woman dreamed that she was sleeping on a bed with black mattresses. This dream symbolizes the loss of her husband due to death, and God knows best. As for a woman who sees herself in a dream, she is sleeping on a broken bed with a dirty colored mattress. It is an indication of illness, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing sleeping on a bed in... A dream about a man and its meaning: Seeing a person sleeping comfortably on a bed next to his wife in a dream is a good sign of the success of his relationship with his wife, which is dominated by love and respect. As for a man who dreams that his friend is sleeping next to him in bed, this means that the two are great friends, love each other and share A profitable project. The vision also indicates the strength of the relationship and the intensity of trust between them. As for a man: if he sees one of his mahrams sleeping next to him in bed, this is evidence of the strength of her love for him and her trust in him. As for seeing him in bed next to a woman other than his wife, it is a metaphor for the common interests between them.

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about the birth of a son according to my friend Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the birth of a boy for my friend. In the world of dreams, a person sees many things that may be related to him or his friends and family. A woman may see the birth of a child for one of her friends. Is this dream related to goodness or not? We explain the interpretation of a dream about giving birth to a boy to my friend in the following lines. Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to a boy to my friend by Ibn Sirin. What is the interpretation of a dream about giving birth to a boy to my friend? Interpreters agree that the idea of ​​pregnancy and childbirth in many interpretations are pleasant matters, whether for the fortuneteller or for the person who saw his birth in the dream. If If a woman sees that her friend is giving birth to a son, the dream indicates that this friend will receive an inheritance from a relative. The interpretation varies according to the woman’s social circumstances. If she is single, the matter is different from the interpretation of a married woman or a pregnant woman. Each situation has a suitable interpretation for it. The topic may indicate the arrival of an occasion or a joyful event in the friend’s life, and if she is married, it is expected that she will become pregnant, God willing. But if this woman is unmarried and wants to get married and succeed in it, and the dreamer sees that she has given birth to a distinguished and handsome boy. It is likely that you will marry an honest and loyal person who has many good qualities. The interpretation changes if his appearance is not beautiful, because it is a confirmation of his relationship with a corrupt person, and people hate dealing with him because of his bad morals. Interpretation of a dream about the birth of a son to my friend, according to Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that the birth of a child For the dreamer, it can be an expression of some unresolved stresses and problems in general, but it can carry the meaning of inheritance and abundance of money in other interpretations. It indicates that the friend, if it is a girl, will soon get married and get close to a good life partner who will push her to happiness and comfort. But if she is already pregnant and sees her giving birth in a dream and she is in her last months, then he must inform her of the possibility that she will give birth soon, God willing, and the more beautiful the baby girl is, Ibn Sirin confirms that the woman’s circumstances will stabilize and she will be very happy after her birth, God willing. But if she is actually pregnant She saw her giving birth in a dream and she was in her last months, so he must inform her of the possibility that she will give birth soon, God willing, and the more beautiful the child is, Ibn Sirin assures that the woman’s circumstances will stabilize and she will be very happy after her birth, God willing. A specialized Egyptian website on the Internet that includes a team of the best Interpreters of dreams and visions in the Arab world. To access it, type the Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site in Google. Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to a boy to my friend. There is a large group of interpretations that came in the dream of giving birth to a boy to an unmarried friend, because the indications that relate to him are diverse and large. A man loves her. But if the birth is and the fortuneteller sees that the boy is ugly or sick, then the matter is different, because it indicates marriage or a failed engagement due to the suitor’s morals. If the friend gave birth to a child but he died, then the dream reflects many difficult issues that concern the friend, because they Surrounded by conflicts and crises that make her lose her comfort and balance. In general, the dream carries some signs that concern the partner more than the dreamer herself, and

title: Interpretation of the death of a rabbit in a dream The death of a rabbit in a dream

preview.html: A dream about a dead rabbit for a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, a man, whether the dead rabbit is hunting white or black, large or small, domestic or wild, according to Ibn Sirin Rabbit A dead rabbit in a dream, one of the dreams that brings us many associations, the colors of rabbits differ in interpretation, as well as the size of the rabbit symbolizes different associations, we will learn about them through our next topic, according to the views of the scholars of interpretation, and according to the social and psychological state of the dreamer, the rabbit is one of the beautiful animals that provide the body with many beautiful benefits. Interpretation of the death of a rabbit in a dream Whoever dreams that his rabbit has died, a disaster will harm him because of the children Interpretation of a rabbit in a dream by Ibn Sirin The rabbit in a dream symbolizes cowards. Seeing a dead or dead rabbit in a dream also symbolizes a bad omen. Also, seeing a small rabbit in sadness and distress. Slaughtering rabbits symbolizes divorce. In the best dream of rabbits, seeing rabbit hunting symbolizes the fulfillment of requirements, and seeing rabbit skin symbolizes a limited commodity. The rabbit symbolizes unhappiness and pain. It also symbolizes escaping from the rabbit or Chasing him in disputes and disagreements between the fortune teller and those close to him. Interpretation of a rabbit in a dream for a single woman The rabbit symbolizes the fulfillment of desires. The white rabbit, and feeding it in a dream, symbolizes marriage to a man of good reputation. In general, seeing the white color of rabbits in a dream for a man or a girl symbolizes marriage, God willing. Small rabbits also symbolize sorrows and distress. The white rabbit symbolizes good events. Interpretation of a rabbit in a dream for a married woman The rabbit symbolizes the woman's unfair treatment of her husband. It also symbolizes small rabbits in pregnancy and offspring. Seeing a rabbit symbolizes pleasant surprises and happy events. Many rabbits in the house symbolize livelihood and money. The brown rabbit symbolizes a happy married life and stability of the family and household. Also, to see a black rabbit, it symbolizes liberation from sorrows and distress, and seeing a man in a dream can symbolize deception. Interpretation of a rabbit in a dream for a pregnant woman The rabbit symbolizes goodness and wealth. A white rabbit symbolizes the birth of a girl. The black rabbit also symbolizes the birth of a boy. It symbolizes The brown rabbit to the birth of a child with a good, healthy and sound face, God willing. The birth of a rabbit in a dream symbolizes a new baby with a good face for the fortune teller. Interpretation of seeing rabbits in a dream The yellow rabbit symbolizes illness, distress and sadness. The gray rabbit symbolizes the cowardly man and can symbolize happiness on its way to the seer. The brown rabbit in a dream symbolizes a man with a strong personality. The overweight rabbit symbolizes a lot of abundant good. Wild rabbits symbolize loss and loss. Seeing a rabbit can symbolize a miserable cowardly person. The dreamer's kiss to the rabbit symbolizes marital strife and family conflict. Interpretation of killing a rabbit in a dream The rabbit was killed by bullets, which symbolizes the success of the dreamer in his professional life. Interpretation of a rabbit bite in a dream The rabbit bites the bride
